alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 9:09PM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches with locally higher snowfall totals. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
